name: BuildADFTask
description: Validates all JSON files of ADF (v2) (#adftools)
author: Kamil Nowinski (AzurePlayer)
releaseNotes:
Added a few fields to 'Export' mode.

adftools version behind this task: 1.9.0

inputs.name: DataFactoryCodePath
inputs.label: Azure Data Factory Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path from the repo root to the ADF folder which should contains sub-folders like 'pipeline', 'dataset', etc.

inputs.name: Action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Build validates files integrity. No outcome files.
The second option validates files and export ARM Template files like ADF UI does (ARM Template files as the result).

inputs.name: DataFactoryConfigPath
inputs.label: Config Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide path to folder with config files. By default it's 'deployment' subfolder of ADF path.

inputs.name: ResourceGroup
inputs.label: Resource Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the Resource Group.

inputs.name: AdfUtilitiesVersion
inputs.label: Adf Utilities Version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide the version if you must use particular one, otherwise remain empty.
Check out recent version: [azure-data-factory-utilities](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@microsoft/azure-data-factory-utilities)

inputs.name: OutputFolder
inputs.label: Output Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target location where ARM Template files will be generated to
